name: Space Ranger (Chocolate_lis)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project for Unity course.

Modifications:

  1. Added pickup bonuses to increase health and fire rate.
  2. Destructible asteroids that split the second level into pieces.
  3. Added the ability to rotate enemies around themselves.
  4. Used spawners of various types of enemies.
  5. Three different levels created.

You must kill all enemies to win the second and third level! Try to find all the bonuses, this will simplify the task :)

Credits:

Created by Bykova Elizaveta
